FILE: cm560572v11.0.txt
DYAD: SOUTH AFRICA - SWAZILAND
RIVALRY: RIV1167
DISPUTE(S): MID2599 MID2753 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190218
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190218

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2599 

TERRMID: MID2599 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2599 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2599 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2599 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2599 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2599 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2599 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2599 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2599 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2599 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID2599 from Gibler 2018, South Africa conducted several raids into Swaziland in 1986. They were targeting members of the ANC, a militarized rebel group that attacked the South African government. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to militarized rebels in Swaziland targeting South Africa. 

CIVWARLINK: MID2599 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2599 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2599 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2599 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2599 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2599 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID2753 

TERRMID: MID2753 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2753 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2753 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2753 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2753 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2753 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2753 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2753 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2753 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2753 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID2753 from Gibler 2018, South African troops shot a Swazi man across the border when he tried to cross into South Africa. Swaziland protested. Coded not civil war because this was not connected to militarized rebel activity and was a border control issue. News coverage of the MID does not indicate that the civilian was associated with any rebel group. 

CIVWARLINK: MID2753 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2753 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2753 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2753 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2753 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2753 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
